sense.gloss: to load (a gun, etc.), to charge
to include (e.g. tax in a sales price)
to hang over, to shroud, to enshroud, to envelop, to screen
adopting a child after one's own has died, child adopted in this manner
cavity in an oar (fitted onto a peg as part of a traditional oarlock)
inro, seal case, pill box, medicine case
to stay indoors, to be confined indoors
to talk down, to argue down
to hesitate to say, to mumble, to hem and haw, to falter

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑猫↑↓ねこ↓は↑籠↑↓かご↓から↑出↑↓で↓てきた。
sdata.e: My cat came out of the basket.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑花↑↓はな↓でいっぱいの↑大↑↓おお↓きな↑籠↑↓かご↓を↑持↑↓も↓っています。
sdata.e: He has a large basket full of flowers.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はすばやく↑子猫↑↓こねこ↓を↑籠↑↓かご↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑閉↑↓と↓じ↑込↑↓こ↓めた。
sdata.e: She quickly shut the kitten into a basket.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はりんごのいっぱい↑入↑↓はい↓った↑籠↑↓かご↓を↑持↑↓も↓っていた。
sdata.e: She had a basket full of apples.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑草↑↓くさ↓を↑編↑↓あ↓んで↑籠↑↓かご↓を↑作↑↓つく↓った。
sdata.e: She wove the grass into a basket.

sdata.j: ↑籠↑↓かご↓の↑中↑↓なか↓のリンゴの↑数↑↓かず↓を↑数↑↓かぞ↓えなさい。
sdata.e: Count the apples in the basket.

sdata.j: ↑籠↑↓かご↓の↑鳥↑↓とり↓に↑水↑↓みず↓とえさをまいにちやるようにしてください。
sdata.e: Please see that the birds in the cage get water and food every day.

sdata.j: ↑籠↑↓かご↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑鳥↑↓とり↓が↑鳴↑↓な↓いていますね。
sdata.e: There's a bird singing in the cage, isn't there?

sdata.j: ↑籠↑↓かご↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑鳥↑↓とり↓が↑鳴↑↓な↓いていますね。
sdata.e: There are birds singing in the cage, aren't there?

sdata.j: ↑籠↑↓かご↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には↑何↑↓なに↓が↑入↑↓はい↓ってるの？
